Rulings.Edison:
●The,, and Continuous Effects don't start a Chain.
●If you activate Sanguine Swamp while you control face-down Spell or Trap Card(s), it is destroyed after it resolves.
Rulings.Tengu:
(1) If you control any other Spell or Trap Cards, destroy this card. (2) Face-down Spell and Trap Cards cannot be activated. (3) Destroy this card during your 2nd Standby Phase after activation.
●The (1), (2), and (3) Continuous-like Effects do not start a Chain.
●If you activate Sanguine Swamp while you control face-down Spell or Trap Card(s), it is destroyed after it resolves.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'Sanguine Swamp's' effect that destroys itself during the Standby Phase does not start a Chain.
● If you activate 'Sanguine Swamp' while you control face-down Spell/Trap Card(s), it is destroyed after it resolves.

Rulings.Base: 1. The effect of "Sanguine Swamp" that destroys itself during the Standby Phase does not start a Chain.\n2. If you activate "Sanguine Swamp" while you control face-down Spell or Trap Card(s), it is destroyed after it resolves.
